attributes.action: Make sure that all new hospitals are fit for purpose
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having seen the new Queens hospital in romford and the almighty mess that has been made of it, this petetion proposes that all new hospitals are fit for purpose.
for example, telephone systems that work, stairwells that are open to the public, all wards and equipment are easy to clean, there is sufficiant parking for staff and patients, the streets around are well signposted, the wards and other services are clearley marked inside.
Hospitals should not be designed to look pretty they should be designed to function.
